title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: Polygon Matic Faucet is an open site for everyone to claim free MATIC on Mumbai Network.The faucet does not require anything, but a Polygon address to start receiving testnet MATIC.Its existence is crucial to the Polygon network, which is the only way for developers to get fuel for Smart Contract deployment on testnet.The faucet is built for testing and educational purposes only, which makes testnet MATIC and tokens unvaluable.â˜… Read more in our article: What is Matic Faucet? Add Mumbai RPC on KEYRING PRO
